Class GGImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.jgamegrid.GGImage

  • public class GGImage
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to provide some convenient static helper methods for image transformations (in construction).

      • setTransparency

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage setTransparency(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bi,
                                           java.awt.Color color,
                                           int alpha)
        Sets the transparency of the given color to given value.
        Parameters:
        alpha - value in the range 0 to 255. 0 is completely transparent (invisible) and 255 is completely opaque
